testcase.name: ReconcileGatewayProxies creating proxy a gateway has a reported error only creates the valid listeners
ReconcileGatewayProxies creating proxy a virtual service has a reported error only creates the valid virtual hosts
ReconcileGatewayProxies updating proxy updating status it carries over gloo status if proxy changed from gateway's point of view but not gloo's
ReconcileGatewayProxies updating proxy a gateway has a reported error only updates the valid listeners
ReconcileGatewayProxies updating proxy a gateway has been removed removes the listener
ReconcileGatewayProxies updating proxy a virtual service has a reported error only updates the valid virtual hosts
ReconcileGatewayProxies updating proxy a virtual service has been removed removes the virtual host
